MORNING.message:
🌅 Good Morning, Birthday Star! 🌅

Us din Khuda ne bhi jashn manaya hoga,

Jis din aapko apne haathon se banaya hoga,

Usne bhi bahaaye honge aansu,

Jis din aapko dharti par bhej kar,

Khud ko akela paaya hoga.

✨ Have a wonderful morning! ✨ 

 0024

AFTERNOON.message:
☀️ Good Afternoon, Birthday Star! ☀️

Aaj ka din sirf tumhara hai,

Har khushi tumhare paas aaye,

Har sapna tumhara poora ho,

Aur zindagi mein sirf khushiyan laaye.

🌟 Enjoy your special afternoon! 🌟 

 0006

EVENING.message:
🌅 Good Evening, Birthday Star! 🌅

Sham ki ye roshni tumhare liye hai,

Har tara tumhara intezaar kar raha hai,

Aaj ka din khas banane ke liye,

Sabse upar wala tumhara saath de raha hai.

🎆 Have a magical evening! 🎆

NIGHT.message:
🌙 Good Night, Birthday Star! 🌙

Chaand sitare aaj tumhare liye chamak rahe hain,

Raat ki ye khamoshi tumhara jashn mana rahi hai,

Sapnon mein bhi khushiyan tumhara saath dein,

Aur subah ek nayi umang lekar aaye.

💫 Sweet dreams and happy birthday! 💫

BIRTHDAY2024.message:
🎉 Happy Birthday, Amazing Soul! 🎉

Us din Khuda ne bhi jashn manaya hoga,

Jis din aapko apne haathon se banaya hoga,

Usne bhi bahaaye honge aansu,

Jis din aapko dharti par bhej kar,

Khud ko akela paaya hoga.

🎂 Wishing you endless happiness! 🎂

CELEBRATE.message:
🎊 Time to Celebrate! 🎊

Aaj nhi kal kal! 🤣🤣🤣 🌟

SPECIAL.message:
✨ You Are Special! ✨

KADDU MILEGA KADDU 

💖 Keep shining bright! 💖

SURPRISE.message:
🎁 Surprise! It's Your Day! 🎁

Ye surprise tumhare liye hai,

Ye khushi tumhare liye hai,

kal ka din bas tumhara hai, Excitement Hori ?? 🤣😂! 🎈
